pullRequest.title: [RHPAM-2591] Task identifers are recorded on the DB with negative numbers
pullRequest.bodyText: changed oracle scripts to reflect properly the increment by = allocation size in entities.

nodes.bodyText: Why this seq sets increment by to 50? It's not referenced by any entity in the code.

This sequence is only used by a test java class, so it won't really be used in a production environment.
Maybe we can keep it for consistency. Wdyt?
